sqlMessage: In aggregated query without GROUP BY, expression #1 of SELECT list contains nonaggregated column 'ds_public.ds_tenant.did'; this is incompatible with sql_mode=only_full_group_by
sql:
select ds_tenant.did as ds_tenant_did,ds_tenant.ds_key as ds_tenant_ds_key,ds_tenant.ds_name as ds_tenant_ds_name,ds_tenant.ds_type as ds_tenant_ds_type,ds_tenant.ds_dec as ds_tenant_ds_dec,ds_tenant.ds_update_time as ds_tenant_ds_update_time,ds_tenant.ds_create_time as ds_tenant_ds_create_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant_system.did) as ds_tenant_system_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant_system.ds_left_did) as ds_tenant_system_ds_left_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant_system.ds_right_did) as ds_tenant_system_ds_right_did, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant_system.ds_update_time) as ds_tenant_system_ds_update_time, GROUP_CONCAT(ds_tenant_system.ds_create_time) as ds_tenant_system_ds_create_time
                                    from ds_tenant
                                    left join ds_tenant_system on ds_tenant_system.ds_left_did=ds_tenant.did  left join ds_system on ds_system.did=ds_tenant_system.ds_right_did
